Translations.Text: jisamen keval bada hatbhaaga hee jaayega
jisane jhuthala diya tatha (saty se) munh pher liya
parantu, sanyamee (sadaachaaree) usase bacha liya jaayega
jo apana dhan, daan karata hai, taaki pavitr ho jaaye
usapar kisee ka koee upakaar nahin, jise utaara ja raha hai
vah to keval apane param paalanahaar kee prasannata praapt karane ke lie hai
nihsandeh, vah prasann ho jaayega
shapath hai din chadhe kee
aur shapath hai raatri kee, jab usaka sannaata chha jaaye
(he nabee!) tere paalanahaar ne tujhe na to chhoda aur ne hee vimukh hua
aur nishchay hee aagaamee yug tere lie pratham yug se uttam hai
aur tera paalanahaar tujhe itana dega ki too prasann ho jaayega
kya usane tujhe anaath paakar sharan nahin dee
aur tujhe path bhoola hua paaya, to seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya
aur nirdhan paaya, to dhanee nahin kar diya
to tum anaath par krodh na karana
aur maangane vaale ko na jhidakana
aur apane paalanahaar ke upakaar ka varnan karana
(he nabee!) kya hamane tumhaare lie tumhaara vaksh (seena) nahin khol diya
aur tumhaara bojh nahin utaar diya
jisane tumhaaree peeth tod dee thee
aur tumhaaree charcha ko ooncha kar diya
nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
nishchay kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
atah, jab avasar mile, jo aaraadhana mein prayaas karo
aur apane paalanahaar kee or dhyaanamagn ho jao
